mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO file ( id, task_log_id, event_id, name, object_name, provider, type, size, creator, create_time, updater, update_time ) VALUES
(#{f.id}, #{f.taskLogId}, #{f.eventId}, #{f.name}, #{f.objectName}, #{f.provider}, #{f.type}, #{f.size}, #{f.creator}, #{f.createTime}, #{f.updater}, #{f.updateTime})
